page.title: 09VILLAGE SHOP,Yeoford.
page.content: There is only one shop in the whole of our area. It is in the village of Yeoford. The building is over one hundred years old and used to be stables for the horses which were used in the stage coach from{Exeter}to{ {London.}The building became a shop fifty years ago. It is now a Post Office and a General Stores. You can buy all kinds of things there. The children buy their sweets there and the most popular kind is chewits. The adults buy bread and fresh vegetables there and enjoy a chat! The tinned food is a little more expensive but if you add on the price of petrol to{ {Crediton}there is no difference. There is only one bus a week to{Crediton}so it is very handy to have a local shop. The shop and Post Office are closed on a Tuesday afternoon and the Post Office is also closed on Saturday p.m.
